Emergency Department - Patient Communication

Are my test results back yet? I've been waiting here for quite a while, and nobody has told me anything. I just want to know what's happening with this pain. It's not getting better with the medication like it did last time.

Vital Signs

HR:85 bpm
BP:120/80 mmHg
SpO2:98%

PEARLS Communication Guide

Partnership

Build rapport and establish a collaborative relationship

Example: I'm here to help you understand what's happening and work together to address your concerns.
